name: Spheroid X: Zero-G Platformer
description:
Maneuver physics forces with precision using simple controls that bring unprecedented freedom to zero gravity gaming. Control your spacecraft through deadly challenges in space using your thruster and your booster.

Controller required to play. One gamepad controls thrust and direction for effective maneuvering. Confirmed compatible with XBOX controller, and PS4 controller if setup correctly. (Use DS4 Windows software to setup with PC)

Play through 48 handcrafted levels. Best level times are saved.

The timer restarts every launch into level.

Collect all the sun keys in the level to open the exit device, while dodging moving obstacles and physics challenges.

Venture near black holes and counteract their gravity, or get pulled in! Stay in stable orbit around the event horizon with careful maneuvering.

Boost in any direction, and stop momentum anytime. Boost rapidly to jolt around in sharp angles.

Place portals and teleport back to them, to save time, or simply to complete the levels.

Become a Spheroid Operator today!
